DOC.brief_summary: Through a double blinded study, patients with low rectal cancer will be randomized into two equal groups to compare between the 5 year disease free survival as a primary outcome measure.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Outcomes After Laparoscopic Intersphincteric Resection With Total Mesorectal Excision for Low Rectal Cancer.
DOC.criteria: Low rectal cancer below 5 cm from the anal verge Fit for laparoscopic total mesorectal excsion T2, T3 rectal cancer No distant metstasis T1, AND T4 Distant metastasis Tumor infiltrating the dentate line unwilling to participate
